#Wave Plot
```{r}
x <- seq(0,20,0.01)
y <- numeric(0)

for(i in x){
  y <- c(y,sin(i))
}

sin_df <- data.frame(x,y)

head(sin_df)

plot(sin_df)
```

\begin{equation}
\sin^2(x) + \cos^2(x) =1
\end{equation}
